exec: pm.test("test response time is less than 300s", function() {

graphql.query:
query {
    usuarios: usersFullData (limit: 4, offset: 0) {
        idSistema: internalId
        nombre: firstName
        apellido: lastName
        cedula: estatalId
        numeroTelefono: phoneNumber
        genero: gender
        fechaNacimiento: birthday
        correo: email
        creacion: creation
        modificacion: modification
        hashClave: password
    }
}

exec: pm.test("test response time is less than 300s", function() {
pm.test("test response time is less than 300s", function() {

graphql.query:
mutation {
    nuevoUsuario: addUser (
        estatalId: 1075313850,
        firstName: "jose",
        lastName: "daniel",
        phoneNumber: 3188987488,
        email: "josed@outlook.com",
        gender: "Male",
        birthday: "1998-07-24",
        password: "password"
    ) {
        idSistema: internalId
        nombre: firstName
        apellido: lastName
        cedula: estatalId
        numeroTelefono: phoneNumber
        genero: gender
        fechaNacimiento: birthday
        correo: email
    }
}
